bioconda.name: bioconductor-diffbind
bioconda.summary: Differential Binding Analysis of ChIP-Seq Peak Data

biotools.summary: Compute differentially bound sites from multiple ChIP-seq experiments using affinity (quantitative) data. Also enables occupancy (overlap) analysis and plotting functions.

bioschemas.name: DiffBind
bioschemas.summary: Compute differentially bound sites from multiple ChIP-seq experiments using affinity (quantitative) data. Also enables occupancy (overlap) analysis and plotting functions.

galaxy.summary: Diffbind provides functions for  processing  ChIP-Seq  data.
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Compute differentially bound sites from multiple ChIP-seq experiments using affinity (quantitative) data. Also enables occupancy (overlap) analysis and plotting functions.

related_workflows.name: Peak calling with SEACR for RPE1
FOXG1-NEUROD1 KD ChIP-seq: QC; mapping, peaks, plots
